sys_ux_client_script.name: Request page redirection

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">a97af00c1ea031106b4ddc03359c4952</macroponent><name>Request page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
     const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    const table = "task";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_2.result.task.value;
        if (state.producedRecordSysId && sysId) {
            api.setState("producedRecordSysId","");  
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "record_request",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-04 09:03:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>617af00c4fa0311012e63ca5d2919e43</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Request page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="KS Investment Requests" source="x_557984_ks_inve_0">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="KS Investment Requests">3fe2f4c097a031102d7ebf56f053af5a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_617af00c4fa0311012e63ca5d2919e43</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-04 09:03:23</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
